text: Charenton is the name or part of the name of several places: ==France== * Charenton-le-Pont, in the Val-de-Marne département, a commune which has a common border with Paris * Saint-Maurice, Val-de-Marne, a neighboring commune that was called Charenton-Saint-Maurice until 1842 ** Charenton (asylum) * Charenton-du-Cher, in the Cher département *Rue de Charenton, a street in Paris ==United States== * Charenton, Louisiana
title: Charenton
